content: it has become more and more popular to use products that can be reused as for example dishcloths and facial pads / scrubbies crocheted in cotton yarn these can be washed and reused instead of being thrown away after one use they are also a perfect way to use up leftover yarns from a larger project i made my dishcloths with scheepjes sunkissed 100% cotton 50g / 170m and scheepjes cotton 8 100% cotton 50g / 170m and crochet hook 3 0 mm about 20 g of yarn is needed for one dishcloth ❀❀❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ ❀❀❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you heike berg for your amazing work <3 ❀❀❀ **mijo crochet patterns ** for more inspiration and patterns visit my blog https //mijocrochet se/alla-monsterall-patterns-pdf/
